author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Standard Alliance Insurance Announces Delay In Filing Its 2017 Audited Account
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - Standard Alliance Insurance Plc :
* MAY BE UNABLE TO SUBMIT ITS 2017 AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO NSE WITHIN TIMEFRAME REQUIRED BY THE REGULATORY AGENCY‍​
* COMPANY HAD EXPECTED TO FINALIZE THE AUDIT AND PUBLISH ITS 2017 FINANCIAL STATEMENTS BY MARCH 31, 2018
* DELAY IN FILING 2017 ACCOUNTS DUE TO RECENTLY CONCLUDED MERGER EXERCISE WITH STANDARD ALLIANCE LIFE ASSURANCE WHICH REQUIRES ENHANCED DISCLOSURE OF INFORMATION Source text ( bit.ly/2Gs09pu ) Further company coverage:
